import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Logo from '../components/Logo/Logo' const NavBarComp = () => { const getData = useSelector((state) => state.cartReducer.carts) return (
Home All Books Our Contacts
) } export default NavBarComp;
